Discovery Group
Discovery Group Dummy Button DUMMY\nCONTENT * 7 questions of the discovery process * Coaching tips on problem areas in groups * Bible passages lists for Discovery Groups Welcome, Disciple Maker! DISCOVER create new account Discovery Group Training and Tips Discovery Process Reading Plans Feedback Training And Tips FINISHs NEXT TIP 1 Do not allow one person to teach or explain SKIP TIP 2 A good facilitator does not give answers, but asks good questions TIP 3 Give everyone a chance to share even if you have to call on people to share TIP 4 Donâ€™t only read the passages, put them into practice-Obedience is the goal! TIP 5 Share with other people what you are learning about your life with God TIP 6 Meet practical needs in the group and in the community TIP 7 After week two someone besides yourself should be facilitating the group then pass the facilitation around group, it is easy only 6 questions. Discovery Process
